author: chayanit
body:
#### PR description:

According to JIRA (https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-27) and discussed in preMccM meeting, we would like to include one pLHE relval to test the whole machinery in new releases, getting ready for UL, starting from 10_6_0

#### PR validation:

1. Local test has been done under IB CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-05-21-2300 by running 5 events for every new added workflows (1307,1307.17,1307.18 and 25215,25215.17,25215.18) with command line
e.g.
runTheMatrix.py --what standard -l 1370.0 -t 4 --command='-n 5' >& run5evt.log &
2. Also tested by real injection on 10_6_0 and everything ran successfully for noPU, while PU relvals are injected and under production

https://dmytro.web.cern.ch/dmytro/cmsprodmon/workflows.php?campaign=CMSSW_10_6_0__fullsim_noPU_pLHE-1557911007
https://dmytro.web.cern.ch/dmytro/cmsprodmon/workflows.php?campaign=CMSSW_10_6_0__fullsim_PU_pLHE-1558498719

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR: 

This PR is needed for a backport to 10_6_X
title: Add pLHE relvals to standard relval campaign
